overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a robust social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers and a focus on academic and research-oriented content. Engagement varies across platforms, with LinkedIn posts receiving the highest interactions in terms of likes and comments.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new research findings, publications, and updates on academic projects.
Announcements for job opportunities and calls for research collaborations.
Information about upcoming conference presentations and speaking engagements.

recommendations: Increase posting frequency on high-performing platforms like LinkedIn to capitalize on engagement.
Diversify content by including more multimedia elements such as images or videos to enhance post visibility.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon shows moderate engagement, with technical content about algorithms and methodologies resonating well.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn is the most engaging platform, with posts about grants and hiring receiving significant attention.
platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky has a growing follower base, and posts about published papers and research attract good interaction.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
